content: अभिज्ञा {c9c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To recognize, discern; (सा) नाभ्यजानान्नलं नृपं <ls>Mb.</ls> {@--2@} To know, understand, be acquainted with, be aware of, perceive; अहं हि नाभिजानामि भवेदेवं न वेति वा <ls>Mb.</ls>; <ls>Bg. 18. 55</ls>, <ls n="Bg.">4. 14</ls>; <ls n="Bg.">7. 13</ls>; भवदभिज्ञातं कथयतु <ls>Dk. 3</ls>, <ls n="Dk.">78.</ls> {@--3@} To look upon, consider or regard as, know to be. {@--4@} To admit, own, acknowledge; नपुत्रमभिजानामि त्वयि जातं <ls>Mb.</ls> {@--5@} To remember, recollect; used with the Future instead of the Imperfect, Imperfect with यत्, or both when interdependence of two actions is denoted, <ls>P. III. 2. 112</ls>, <ls n="P. III. 2.">114</ls>; <ab>cf.</ab> <ls>Bk. 6. 138</ls>, <ls n="Bk. 6.">139.</ls>
